title: Intuit Boosts Tax Filing Confidence with Claude AI-Powered Explanations | Anthropic \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Intuit Boosts Tax Filing Confidence with Claude AI-Powered Explanations | Anthropic \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Intuit, the maker of TurboTax, partners with Anthropic to use Claude AI to generate clear, accurate tax explanations for millions of customers. Learn how this AI integration increased helpfulness ratings, improved conversion rates, and scaled reliably during peak filing season.
